attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ask that the government make more money available for immunisations for Babies and young children, as recently a visit to my GP I was made aware that supplies had run out and there was a shortage of supplies.  I therefore ask the PM to ensure that all immunisations are never allowed to run short in this country, as our babies are our future.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
